value.tsi.secrets:
- tsi.secret/name: "mysecret1"
  tsi.secret/role: "tsi-role-rcni"
  tsi.secret/vault-path: "secret/tsi-rcni"
  tsi.secret/local-path: "mysecrets/myubuntu-mysecret1"
- tsi.secret/name: "mysecret2.json"
  tsi.secret/role: "tsi-role-rcni"
  tsi.secret/vault-path: "secret/tsi-r"
  tsi.secret/local-path: "mysecrets/myubuntu-mysecret2"
- tsi.secret/name: "password"
  tsi.secret/role: "tsi-role-rcni"
  tsi.secret/vault-path: "secret/tsi-r"
  tsi.secret/local-path: "mysecrets/myubuntu-passwords"
- tsi.secret/name: "invalid"
  tsi.secret/role: "tsi-role-rcni"
  tsi.secret/vault-path: "secret/tsi-rcni"
  tsi.secret/local-path: "mysecrets/myubuntu-invalid"
- tsi.secret/name: "non-existing"
  tsi.secret/role: "tsi-role-rcni"
  tsi.secret/vault-path: "secret/nothing"
  tsi.secret/local-path: "mysecrets/non-existing"
